channel.title: Unofficial SFM Setups Co-Designer Seeking Thread
channel.description:
Title. Make some sort of list (as short or as long as you want) including all the forms of fiction / non-fiction you can think of that you'd be excited about making an SFM setup around
hopefully ppl find ppl to work with
and its possible ppl forgot stuff that they saw before and see that in others' lists which could be cool
Anyways, here's my current list:
Battlestar Galactica FM Middle Ages FM: The Legend of King Arthur (with merlin, arthur, lancelot, percival etc. on town and mordred, morgana, the green knight, nimueh etc. on scum) Elibe (Fire Emblem 7 & 6) FM Tellius (Fire Emblem 9 & 10) FM Magvel (Fire Emblem 8) FM Archanea (Fire Emblem 1 & 3 & 11 & 12) FM Prison Break FM Suits FM Travelers (Canadian TV show) FM Jason Bourne FM Taken (Liam Neeson) FM The 3% (Netflix show) FM Altered Carbon (Netflix show) FM Billions (showtime show) FM The Power of Five (anthony horowitz novel series) FM Mysterious Benedict Society (novel trilogy) FM Artemis Fowl FM 39 Clues FM The spy (netflix show) FM The Blacklist (nbc show) FM Justice League vs Legion of Doom (DC Comics) FM Blade Runner FM Tron (including Legacy and Uprising as well) FM Hitman (video game series) FM Sense8 (netflix show) FM Chronicles of Narnia FM Battle of Supermages: Good vs Evil (DC Comics) FM Marvel vs DC FM (with possible comic characters that are from neither marvel nor dc as neuts) Log Horizon (anime) FM A Certain Scientific Railgun (anime) FM The Boys (amazon show) FM Castlevania (video game series) FM Mission Impossible FM Star Trek Into Darkness FM: Spock vs Khan Inception (movie) FM Avatar: The Last Airbender FM 12 Monkeys (TV Show) FM Mr. Robot (TV Show) FM High-Outerversal vs Boundless FM: The Most Powerful Characters in the History of Fiction The Matrix FM The Legend of Zelda 3D Games FM: War for Hyrule The Legend of Zelda 2D Games FM: The Lost Artifacts Metroid Prime FM Metroid Fusion FM Metroid 2 FM Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic FM: Birth of the Jedi James Bond FM Kingsman FM The Witcher (video game series) FM Supernatural (tv show) FM Doctor Who FM Historical Warring Tribes (500 B.C.E. – 500 C.E.) FM: The Battle for the Silk Road Alex Rider (Novel series) FM Conquest – Alexander the Great FM: Macedonia vs Persia Golden Sun (video game series) FM Dragon Ball Z FM Legion (netflix show) FM Back to the Future FM Wild West FM: Butch Cassidy, Billy the Kid, and many more Incredibles (pixar move) FM Ancient Egypt FM: The Will of the Pharaohs Cold War FM: Capitalism vs Communism Corporate Cars FM: Gasoline vs Electric (Everyone else vs Tesla, with possible hybrid car neuts) Corporate Space Wars FM: SpaceX vs Blue Origin (Elon Musk vs Jeff Bezos, with possible neuts from NASA) Corporate Airplane FM: Boeing vs Airbus Military Aircraft FM: Lockheed-Martin vs Northrop-Grumman Pre-Crash Banks FM: J.P. Morgan Chase vs Lehman Brothers Luxury Sports Car FM: Ferrari vs Bugatti Airline FM: United vs Emirates

item.title: Unofficial SFM Setups Co-Designer Seeking Thread
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
Title.
Make some sort of list (as short or as long as you want) including all the forms of fiction / non-fiction you can think of that you’d be excited about making an SFM setup around

hopefully ppl find ppl to work with

and its possible ppl forgot stuff that they saw before and see that in others’ lists which could be cool

Anyways, here’s my current list:

Battlestar Galactica FM
Middle Ages FM: The Legend of King Arthur (with merlin, arthur, lancelot, percival etc. on town and mordred, morgana, the green knight, nimueh etc. on scum)
Elibe (Fire Emblem 7 & 6) FM
Tellius (Fire Emblem 9 & 10) FM
Magvel (Fire Emblem 8) FM
Archanea (Fire Emblem 1 & 3 & 11 & 12) FM
Prison Break FM
Suits FM
Travelers (Canadian TV show) FM
Jason Bourne FM

The 3% (Netflix show) FM
Altered Carbon (Netflix show) FM
Billions (showtime show) FM
The Power of Five (anthony horowitz novel series) FM
Mysterious Benedict Society (novel trilogy) FM
Artemis Fowl FM
39 Clues FM

Justice League vs Legion of Doom (DC Comics) FM
Blade Runner FM
Tron (including Legacy and Uprising as well) FM
Hitman (video game series) FM
Sense8 (netflix show) FM
Chronicles of Narnia FM
Battle of Supermages: Good vs Evil (DC Comics) FM
Marvel vs DC FM (with possible comic characters that are from neither marvel nor dc as neuts)
Log Horizon (anime) FM
A Certain Scientific Railgun (anime) FM
The Boys (amazon show) FM
Castlevania (video game series) FM
Mission Impossible FM
Star Trek Into Darkness FM: Spock vs Khan

Avatar: The Last Airbender FM
12 Monkeys (TV Show) FM

High-Outerversal vs Boundless FM: The Most Powerful Characters in the History of Fiction
The Matrix FM
The Legend of Zelda 3D Games FM: War for Hyrule
The Legend of Zelda 2D Games FM: The Lost Artifacts
Metroid Prime FM
Metroid Fusion FM
Metroid 2 FM
Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic FM: Birth of the Jedi
James Bond FM
Kingsman FM
The Witcher (video game series) FM
Supernatural (tv show) FM
Doctor Who FM
Historical Warring Tribes (500 B.C.E. – 500 C.E.) FM: The Battle for the Silk Road
Alex Rider (Novel series) FM
Conquest – Alexander the Great FM: Macedonia vs Persia
Golden Sun (video game series) FM
Dragon Ball Z FM
Legion (netflix show) FM
Back to the Future FM
Wild West FM: Butch Cassidy, Billy the Kid, and many more
Incredibles (pixar move) FM
Ancient Egypt FM: The Will of the Pharaohs

Military Aircraft FM: Lockheed-Martin vs Northrop-Grumman
